#labels Phase-Deploy
=== XML Elements ===
  * *webservicepw* - defines the password for your board's webservice, this option is set in the board's control panel
  * *webserviceurl* - points to the location of the vbotservice.php
  * *imservices* - defines the imservices

=== Example ===
{{{
<botconfig> 
     <webservicepw>password</webservicepw> 
     <webserviceurl>http://www.website.com/vbotservice.php</webserviceurl> 
     <imservices> 
          <imservice type="aimconnection" vbalias="aim"> 
               <newline>HTML</newline> 
               <screenname>aimscreenname</screenname>
               <password>password</password>
          </imservice> 
     </imservices> 
</botconfig>
}}}
